items.title: Tenways’ 37-pound CGO600 Pro e-bikes drop to $1,599 with $118 FREE bundles + 50% off range extender, more
items.summary:
Tenways has switched up its New Year e-bike sale offers, with the event currently providing you with up to $600 discounts on models, as well as an extra $200 savings when buying two together. Aside from the more premium models seeing continuing deals from last week, there’s also others like Tenways’ CGO600 Pro Belt Drive Commuter e-bike at $1,599 shipped, while the CGO600 Pro 8-speed chain-drive e-bike is also down at $1,599 shipped. Both of these variants also come with $118 FREE bundle package alongside the option to score a Power Bank (range extender) for an additional $155 (normally $309). These e-bikes normally fetch $1,899 outside of sales, which we’ve mostly seen dropped to $1,599 in our post-tariff market, while select events, like Black Friday, saw the price dip $100 lower. You’re looking at the second-best price of the last year, with $300 cut from the price tag and $418 in savings ($572 in savings if you opt for the power bank offer). You can head below to browse the full lineup of deals.

more…

items.title: Russian Modder Successfully Builds Own 32GB DDR5 RAM; Saves RM2,400 In Costs
